thoughts: Tries to imitate the battle moves of other Rotwound scugs
Wonders if it is {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/} fault or {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor's fault that they ended up here
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could put their hunting training to use
Tries to convince another Rotwound scugs to train {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Misses eating fresh-kill and sharing tongues with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates
Stands by the Ascended border, hoping a slugcat will take pity on {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Furiously slashes a branch so hard {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} spear breaks
Tries to groom {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt only to realize it's too caked with rot to clean
